description: A vulnerability classified as problematic has been found in Rotem Dynamics Rotem CRM up to 20230729. This affects an unknown part of the file /LandingPages/api/otp/send?id=[ID][ampersand]method=sms of the component OTP URI Interface. The manipulation leads to information exposure through discrepancy. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The identifier VDB-233253 was assigned to this vulnerability. NOTE: The vendor was contacted early about this disclosure but did not respond in any way.
